learning_objective: Identify and describe patterns in data visualizations, such as charts or graphs, to make predictions.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex, a budding agro-scientist, has been examining trends in soil fertility in their local area over the past ten years. They have visualized this data in a chart showing nutrient levels over time. Alex notices that certain nutrients have been depleting steadily each year. If this pattern continues, what will nutrient levels be like in 5 years?",
    "Answer1": "The nutrient levels will remain the same.",
    "Answer2": "All nutrients will be completely depleted.",
    "Answer3": "The nutrient levels will decrease following the same trend.",
    "Answer4": "The nutrient levels will increase.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "Since Alex has identified a decreasing trend in nutrient levels over the years, we expect this trend to continue if no changes are made. Thus, Alex can predict that nutrient levels will decrease in 5 years."
}
